attributes.additional_details: Opposition parties refuse to allow a General Election until 'No Deal' is outlawed. This undemocratic move denies the population from having their say. Having the general election as soon as possible will enable the public to have their say and vote for or against 'No Deal'
attributes.background: In 2016 we voted to leave the EU - this has been frustrated by some members of parliament which has resulted in us still not leaving after to vote for leave was held. This is undemocratic.
